revised_title: The Action of Nitric Acid, Binoxide of Manganese, and Sulphuric Acid on Organic Bases
tldr: The author investigates the reactions of nitric acid, binoxide of manganese, and sulphuric acid on various organic bases, including aniline, amylaniline, ethylaniline, and diethylaniline. The results suggest that these reagents can help determine the constitution of natural organic bases, such as narcotine.
